mapper.select: SELECT student.`name` AS studentName, student.class_name as className, sum(scores.score) AS sumScores FROM `student`, scores WHERE student.id = scores.student_id GROUP BY student.`name`, student.class_name

SELECT student.class_name AS className, scores.SUBJECT AS subjectName, AVG( scores.score ) AS averageScore FROM scores LEFT JOIN `student` ON student.id = scores.student_id GROUP BY student.class_name, scores.`subject`
